title: Morde is barely a juggernaut
body:
Buy 2 damage items first on morde? 1500 hp and no defenses ({{item:1402}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3152}}  {{item:3116}} )

Buy 2 damage items first on other juggernauts? easy 2000 hp and good defenses ({{item:3071}} {{item:3074}} {{item:1400}} {{item:1401}} {{item:3748}} )

Seriously early-mid game I get killed in like 2 seconds (last game record was 1.56) while other juggernauts can easily tank damage to go in
{{champion:122}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:86}} 

/rant

uhg, First people complained about the Rylie's nerf in context of Mord, and now I'm hearing that mord can't be balanced as being a Juggernaut because of a sustain item. 

Why is he balanced around a sustain item? I thought they addressed this when the reworked Vlad. buff the HP ratio on his max shield, and you will have a decent Juggernaut. (Also, a little extra MS would go a long way)

not because of the item. my guess is its a problem to give him decent base stats because of his entire shield mechanic.

i don't know where you got that assumption from but I said nothing of the sort.

mordekaiser compensates his bad base stats by having the best defensive steroid in the game. there's no reason to buff it for as long as he can immediately add and re-add health to himself. 

he's fine right now, anyway
51% winrate with .83% pickrate, so only mains are really picking him and he hardly has a positive wr. How is that fine?
I love when people cry for champion buffs. You don't realize how unfun it is to have your main become fotm.
I don't think small buffs to his tankiness is gonna break him
Except Dedicate mains of Mordekaiser have a 56% winrate according to Lolalytic.
To bad i can never survive long enough for me to actually sustain properly

How is {{item:3152}} {{item:3116}} not defenses wut. That's health right there.

Also {{item:3146}} gives sustain, which is pseudo defenses.

His heal also scales with his AP, while other juggernaut's heal scale with their health.

Also, no other juggernaut ever buys more than 1 damage item except Shyvana. The most anyone else will sometimes buy is Titanic Cleaver (Darius) or Cleaver DD (Illaoi). If they bought Cleaver Rav they would also melt, except Darius but that's because Darius.
protobelt and rylais is no where on par with cleaver and hydra, and as i said before, I generally die before i can even use gunblade well

> [{quoted}](name=TheIronRevenant,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=liOh0to2,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-28T20:12:51.312+0000)

> A juggernaut dying in 2 seconds while generally cc'd is good?

To be fair, most juggernauts can only live for 3-4 seconds unless they're fed.

Morde gets a hugeass heal after 2 seconds, so it's kill him before that or don't kill him at all.

The real issue is that gunblade straight up is NOT a good item on him in practice.

Looks amazing on paper, but is actually pretty bad ingame. All of the high ranked mordekaiser mains go {{item:3116}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3135}}
